email_body:
Hi Ray,

I hope this email finds you well. It's always great to catch up with fellow GraphConnect attendees. I came across your name through Gale Robinson, who mentioned that you have a significant role at SafeSecurity. You may also know me through Moses Sharp, as I share a common chain of command with him.

I am working on an exciting project that I believe might be of interest to you. It's a product of insightful discussions after GraphConnect and the continued collaborative efforts of our teams at SafeSecurity. We've particularly taken Gale's work on 'An Ontology for Cyber Security' as a starting point.

I’d like to share the details of our project, but due to its confidential nature, we are sharing it via secure links. You can access the project overview here.

I look forward to your thoughts and feedback on this.

Best,
Lars Treble
